account: Do you already have an account?
working_time: We accept calls from 7:00 to 22:00 and respond to messages from 9:00 to 21:00
delivery_text:
Orders over 8,000 tenge are delivered free of charge. For orders under 8,000 tenge, delivery is 700 tenge. We deliver orders same day, 7 days a week, from 7:00 AM to 11:00 PM.
Express delivery in 60 minutes costs 900 tenge; orders are accepted from 7:00 AM to 11:59 PM.
Delivery is available within Almaty only.
when_order_delivered: When will the order be delivered?
refund: Why did the order price change? Will I get a refund?
faq1:
Find the "Login" button in the upper right corner of the website.
  Enter your phone number with the +7 prefix, receive an SMS, and enter the short code. Done!
If you don't have a phone nearby or don't live in Kazakhstan, you can register by email. Click the "Login by Email" button below.Enter your email address, click "Continue," and enter the six-digit code from the email. Done!
faq2:
You can find the products you need in three ways:
Enter the name in the search bar
In the section navigation (e.g., Products —> Grocery —> Flour) Find special collections on the main page.
Add your favorite items to your cart. There is no minimum or maximum order on the website—only the shipping cost depends on the quantity of items. To place an order, go to "Cart" in the upper right corner of the website and click "Place Order."
faq3:
You can pay in 4 ways, choose the one that's most convenient for you:
Online, by Visa/MasterCard
Card to the courier (the courier will bring a POS terminal and give you a receipt)
faq4:
Arbuz delivers groceries daily from 7:00 AM to 11:59 PM. Delivery time depends on when you place your order. If you choose express delivery, we'll deliver your order within 60 minutes.
We deliver orders same day during business hours, but we can also deliver on a different scheduled day—just select a different date when placing your order.
faq5:
700 tenge for orders under 8,000 tenge. Free for orders over 8,000 tenge.
Express delivery costs 900 tenge.
faq6:
If your order included items sold by weight, it's not always possible to accurately measure the weight down to the gram, so the final cost may change slightly.
If the total is less and you've already paid online, the amount debited to your card will change within three business days.
no_favorites_subtext: This is where your favorite things are kept
really_want_to_clear: Are you sure you want to clear your favorites? Returning all items will be impossible.
search_on_catalogue: Use the search to find everything you need or go to the catalog
promo_code_text: Your promo code for your first order in our app!
card_empty_subtext: Products for purchase will be located here
order_bold_text: The order has been successfully completed
order_sub_text: Your delivery is expected tomorrow between 7:00 and 9:00
messages_sub_text: Messages about promotions, discounts and current orders will be displayed here
welcome_sub_text: Sign in to earn points, save your delivery address, and save your order history.
